sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.0%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble Company registers a 1.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Visa ( V ), trading down 0.5%.
Visa is showing a gain of 15.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ), trading down 0.4%, and Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
